welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Alden, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly locals, and rich history. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in all the wonders our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves mainly domestic flights and is connected to the main terminal via a shuttle bus.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'BUF Free Wi-Fi' from the list of available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
